events.message: Ten clicks. You must be really bored.
Fifteen. Are you expecting a medal?
Twenty. Matrix called, it wants its button back.
Fifty. Button is now officially unimpressed.
Seventy. Cosmic horror is mildly amused.
Eighty. Final warning. Or is it?
Ninety. Button now round. Like your patience.
100 presses! You have unlocked... THE BIG SURPRISE!
events.action:

';document.body.appendChild(surprise);surprise.querySelector('button').onclick=function(){document.body.removeChild(surprise);};

events.message: 175. You know what? Here, have a knob to turn.
events.action: document.getElementById('knob').style.display='block';document.getElementById('message').innerHTML='Try turning the knob. Maybe it does something.'

events.message: 200. Button has evolved legs and is trying to escape.
events.action: document.getElementById('button-body').style.display='block';document.getElementById('button-body').style.animation='moveButton 2s infinite';document.getElementById('message').innerHTML='The button has evolved. Now it can move!'
